comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: The Wardlaw-Smith House (also known as the Smith Mansion) is a U.S. historic building in Madison, Florida. It is located at 103 North Washington Street. On June 30, 1972, it was added to the U.S. National Register of Historic Places. Bought in 1988 by North Florida Community College; the college uses it as a conference center. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wardlaw-Smith_House
